I have a question- My original Caretaker is a Nurse practitioner, so will she be the one to recommend a new doctor for me when  my Pathology report comes back. Posts.Title: Waiting and anxious Karmen Karmen

Posts.Content: Aug 4, 2014 04:37PM K51 wrote: Hello Icfriedman: Please take some time to your self, even if it means going to the bathroom and having a good cry. I have been at work and just went down to the ladies restroom where it is quiet and had a hell of cry- It's ok- you need to be able to get some time to yourself where you can get in touch with your emotions and just let it all hang out. I will have a guided biopsy on Wednesday- and I have already been told by the Ultrasound tech and doctor  that was on staff that day- that it may be cancer- stage 2 - so I have did my research and Have true dimpling and pain. So, just go and take care of yourself - because everyone means well, but they do not know what we are facing but us....

Posts.Content: Jul 30, 2014 07:07PM K51 wrote: Hi Ava, I am also in Houston- will get my biopsy soon. The Doctor that was interpreting my Ultrasound results says that the Tumor below my nipple- about 2.4cm - will have to come out- so she says right now I am classified as stage 2. I am with Herman -Cypress right now- but I am thinking about M.D. Anderson as well. I have lots of pain  & indentation concerning my breast, and right now I am having back pain- do not know if its the possible cancer or because I have a tipped uterus- everything seems to hurt since I have the Diagnostic Mammogram with Ultrasound on yesterday....
